title: Canal Hydrodynamics
desc:
The Canal Hydrodynamics data visualization allows users to see the direction of water flow through the canals in Venice. In order to do so, it provides simulations, which can be stepped through manually or played, based on different time periods in order to give the user an idea of what the water movement might look like throughout the day.

Click on the floating button in the bottom right-hand corner to check it out!
